tuv.seg: Moving your children to primary school
Do pháiste a aistriú chuig bunscoil in Éirinn

If you are moving to Ireland and you have a child of school-going age, you will need information about the educational choices available to you and the procedures involved in getting your child enrolled
Má tá tú ag teacht go hÉirinn agus páiste in aois scoile agat beidh ort teacht ar eolas maidir leis na roghanna oideachais atá ann duit agus a bhfuil le déanamh leis an bpáiste a chlárú sa scoil
The dates of the school year for primary school children are not standardised but all schools are closed for July and most (or all) of August
Is ón 1éad Meán Fómhair go dtí 30ú Meitheamh a mhaireann an bhliain scoile do pháiste bunscoile in Éirinn
Children attend primary school from around the age of 4 or 5 years until they are 12 or 13 years of age
Bíonn páistí ag freastal ar an scoil ó aois tuairim is 4 nó 5 go dtí go mbíonn siad 12 nó 13 bliain d’aois
The primary school cycle is 8 years long
Ocht mbliana ar fad atá sa chóras bunscoile
Schools generally have 2 years of infant classes, followed by class 1 to class 6
Bíonn dhá bhliain go ginearálta den chiondarghairdín ag scoileanna, agus ansin ina dhiaidh sin ranganna 1 go dtí 6
Your child will not be obliged to attend school before the age of 6. However, Irish children attend school at age 4 or 5
Níl aon dualgas ort do pháiste a chur chuig an scoil roimh 6 bliana, ach de gnáth bíonn páistí in Éirinn ag freastal ar an scoil chomh hóg le 4
Pre-school education is available for children from the age of 3 to 5 and a half years under the Early Childhood Care and Education (ECCE) Scheme
Mar gheall ar seo bíonn na ranganna is óige sa bhunscoil ag ple le rudaí a bheadh déanta i dtíortha eile sa chóras réamhscoile
You also have a constitutional right to educate your child at home
Tá ceart bunreachtúil agat freisin oideachas a chur ar do pháiste ag baile
However, this is not common practice
Ach ní tharlaíonn seo go minic
The types of schools available
Cineálacha scoileanna atá ar fáil
The primary education sector consists of State-funded primary schools, special schools and private primary schools
Scoileanna maoinithe ag an Stáit, chomh maith le scoileanna speisialta agus bunscoileanna príobháideacha iad bunscoileanna na hÉireann
State-funded primary schools used to be known as national schools and you may still hear this term being used
Scoileanna náisiúnta a tugadh ar bhunscoileanna maoinithe ag an Stáit agus cloistear an téarma seo in úsáid fós
State-funded schools include religious schools, multi-denominational schools and Gaelscoileanna, which are schools that teach the curriculum through the Irish language
San áireamh le scoileanna atá maoinithe ag an Stáit tá scoileanna creidimh, scoileanna illaicme agus Gaelscoileanna a bhíonn ag teagasc tré mheán na Gaeilge
You can find a list of State-funded primary schools on the Department of Education and Skills website
Tá liosta bhunscoileanna maoinithe ag an Stáit ar fáil ar an suíomh gréasáin Roinn Oideachais agus Scileanna
Religion in Irish schools
Creideamh i Scoileanna na hÉireann
Most primary schools are under the management of one denomination or another and the majority of these are Roman Catholic
Scoileanna aon chreideamh iad formhór bunscoileanna na hÉireann agus is scoileanna Caitliceacha iad an chuid is mó acu
There is, however, a growing choice of schools of other denominations and of multi-denominational schools
Tá, áfach, fás ag teacht ar an méid scoileanna illaicme
Schools that cater for a single religion may give priority to children of that religion but they may also admit children with other religious beliefs, or none
Scoileanna a bhíonn ag plé le creideamh amháin tugann siad tús áite do pháistí den chreideamh sin ach tá siad sásta glacadh le páistí ó chreidimh eile, nó gan creideamh
Children do not have to attend religion classes and you may choose to withdraw your child from such classes if you wish
Níl aon dualgas ar ghasúir freastal ar ranganna creidimh agus is féidir leat an rogha a dhéanamh do pháiste a choinneáil ó na ranganna sin
Regardless of religion, all primary schools operate under similar rules
Is cuma cén creideamh atá acu, bíonn na bunscoileanna ar fad ag oibriú faoi mórán na rialacha céanna
The main differences relate to the appointment of the principal of the school and the choice of teacher representatives on the Board of Management
Baineann na príomhdhifríochtaí le ceapuchán príomhoide na scoile agus rogha ionadaí na múinteoirí ar an mBord Bainistíochta
The Irish primary school curriculum is child-centred
Tá curaclam bunscoileanna na hÉireann dírithe ar an bpáiste
Certain children who come to live in Ireland may be exempted from learning Irish in school
• Ról lárnach ag foghlaim agus modhanna teagaisc imeachtaí agus nochtú faoi threoir
You should, in theory, be able to send your child to the school of your choice
Ba cheart, de réir teoirice, go mbeadh tú in ann do pháiste a chur chuig do rogha scoil
However, when it comes to enrolling your child, you may find that there is little or no choice in the area in which you live
Ach, nuair atá páiste le clárú agat sa scoil d'fhéadfadh sé nach mbeidh mórán nó aon rogha agat ag brath ar an áit ina bhfuil cónaí ort
Each school operates an admissions policy, which they must make available on request
Bíonn polasaí iontrála ag gach scoil, polasaí nach mór dóibh a chur ar fáil má iarrtar é
It is important to ask for the admissions policy of any school in which you are interested
Tá sé tábhachtach an polasaí iontrála atá ag an scoil a bhfuil spéis agat inti a lorg
State-funded primary schools tend to give priority to children living in the immediate area, but problems can arise if their classes are already full and they have a waiting list
Is iondúil go dtugann bunscoileanna stáit tús áite do pháistí atá ina gcónaí sa cheantar ach, bíonn fadhbanna ann má tá na ranganna lán cheana agus liosta feithimh acu
Multi-denominational schools and Gaelscoileanna each decide their own admissions policy
Déanann scoileanna illaicme agus Gaelscoileanna cinneadh ar a gcuid polasaithe iontrála féin
Some secondary schools give priority to students coming from particular primary schools so it may be useful to plan ahead when choosing a primary school for your child
Tugann roinnt meánscoileanna tús áite do mhic léinn a thagann as bunscoileanna faoi leith agus mar sin b'fhéidir gur ceart breathnú ar an todhchaí agus bunscoil dhá roghnú agat do do pháiste
Children are entitled to free primary and post-primary education
Is iondúil go bhfaighfidh do pháiste áit sa scoil náisiúnta is giorra do d'áit chónaithe
The majority of primary schools are State-funded which means that you will not have to pay annual fees for your child's education
Níl sé seo iomlán cinnte, áfach, ní bheidh cead iontrála ag páiste má tá an scoil lán cheana
In practice, however, schools often need to raise extra funds for additional resources such as computers, sports equipment or improved facilities
Is féidir leat do pháiste a chur chuig aon scoil phríobháideach is mian leat, ach áit a bheith ar fáil inti agus na táillí cuí a íoc. Rátaí
You may be asked to make a contribution or to take part in fund-raising for the school, but your participation in these activities must always be voluntary

Tá páistí in Éirinn i dteideal oideachas bunscoile agus iar-bhunscoile saor in aisce a fháil. Tá formhór na mbunscoileanna maoinithe ag an Stáit agus mar sin níl aon táille bhliantúil le n-íoc agat ar son oideachas do pháiste
State-funded schools cannot require you to make contributions
Ní féidir le scoileanna atá maoinithe ag an Stáit iachall a chur ort páirt a ghlacadh in imeachtaí le hairgead a bhailiú
If you choose to send your child to a private school, you will have to pay annual fees
Má roghnaíonn tú do pháiste a chur chuig scoil phríobháideach beidh ort táillí a íoc
These can vary considerably from school to school
Beidh an-difríocht idir na táillí seo ag brath ar an scoil
Contact the school of your choice to ask for details of fees and other expenses
Déan teagmháil le do rogha scoil le heolas faoi na táillí agus costais eile a fháil
Contact the school to which you want to send your child
Déan teagmháil leis an scoil gur mian leat do pháiste a chur chuici
Ask for their admissions policy and check whether you need to register your child's name on a waiting list
Iarr ar an scoil an polasaí iontrála atá acu a chur chugat agus fáigh amach an gá ainm do pháiste a chur ar liosta feithimh
You can find out more about starting primary school here
Leigh tuilleadh eolais faointosú ar bhunscoil anseo
